    return s.replace('!', '')

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join([x for x in s if x != '!'])

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return (s.replace("!","")) # replaces !'s with nothing

    return ''.join(list(l for l in s if l != '!'))
remove_exclamation_marks = lambda a: a.replace("!", "")

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    str = s.replace("!", "")
    return str

# Write function RemoveExclamationMarks which removes all exclamation
# marks from a given string.

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return s.translate(str.maketrans({'!': ''}))

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return s if not s else s.replace('!', '')

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return "".join([i for i in s if ord(i) != 33])

import re
def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    res = re.sub(r'!','', s)
    return res

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join(i if i!='!' else '' for i in s)

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join(ele for ele in s if ele != '!')

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join([x for x in s if not x == '!'])

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join([i for i in list(str(s)) if i!= '!'])

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    #your code here
    st = s.replace('!', '')
    return st

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return "".join(filter(lambda char: char !="!", list(s)))

def remove_exclamation_marks(n):
    return n.replace('!',"")

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    sp = s.split("!")
    new_string = "".join(sp)
    return new_string

def remove_exclamation_marks(s):
    return ''.join((x for x in s if x is not '!'))
